name: Framebench
overview:
Framebench is a cloud based communication and feedback platform specially for digital agencies and creative design firms.

Its your central workplace where you can store & share your creative assets. Remote teams & clients can then review, mark changes required on the assets and even host discussions on them in real time. All of this is automatically documented for viewing at any later time. Such a visual communication workflow allows for crisp & quick feedback, reducing the iterations taken for delivery and first hand sharing with the team members who need to address those changes. Thus, letting design teams focus on what they do best..create!
